file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-31-01-06 - SPINNER - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SPINNER - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-72-167 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the engine fan spinner assembly for cracks. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY INSPECT FAN SPINNER ASSEMBLY IN- PRE-MOD. S.B. 72-31-01-200-801-A ♦ SPECTION FOR CRACKS - DETAILED IN- AE3007A-72-167 SPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-31-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-31-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-72-167 2. INSPECT FAN SPINNER ASSEMBLY INSPECTION FOR CRACKS - DETAILED INSPECTION A. General (1) Obey the instructions in Rolls-Royce MM CSP34022 to inspect the engine fan spinner assembly for cracks. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 LH Engine 423 RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the cowling 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task On the engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the START 1/2 circuit breakers and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to it: (2) Put the workstand in the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-31-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Inspect (Detailed Inspection) Fan Spinner SUBTASK 220-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Do a detailed inspection of the fan spinner for cracks. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the START 1/2 circuit breakers. (2) Remove the workstand from the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-31-01 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
